description: SORN is a service within vehicle licensing, which also covers tax disc. SORNs must be made for a registered vehicle that is not being used on the road, and which has been taxed since 31 January 1998.

modules.title: Service availability
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
